short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discount the TAX/VAT applied to all products + Quick identification of Amazon products with shipping restrictions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discount The TAX/VAT applied to products sold and ship by Amazon. The extension only works on the following Amazon's websites: ES, UK, IT, FR y DE.

Elimina el IVA aplicado en los productos vendidos y enviados por Amazon. Solo funciona en las regiones de Amazon: ES, UK, IT, FR y DE.

Open source : https://github.com/MDaniel592/TaxFree
